Posts.Content: hello I have just been told my breast cancer has spread to my liver, I have got an appointment with my consultant at Derby nest Thursday and I am absoloutely petrified. I am in some pain and have been given Tramadol to help with that. Has anyone out there got the same and if so is there anything positive at all to say because all I can think about at the moment is how soon am I going to die.............................please help if you can
Posts.Title: liver secondaries
